Text: Canadian TransferThe transfer of your securities and mutual funds is in process There are a few Canadian items that will not transfer You mentioned that you would like to sell the Canadian securities and transfer the cash Can you please call Dale Onrait at and have him liquidate the Canadian positions and tell him you would like the proceeds and the Candian cash to be converted to US dollars and transfered to RBC Dain Rauscher This instruction must come from you If you have any questions please give me a call Stephen P Brown Financial Consultant RBC Dain Rauscher West Sam Houston Parkway South Suite Houston TX Phone Fax

Cost BasisWe are trying to establish your cost basis in your account Do you have confirms from the purchase date on your securities so we can see when the securities were purchased We need to know the date because of the currency conversion Dale Onrait in Canada said you purchased the securities from another branch so he does not have the records This is for your benefit in determining your position if you sell the securities Also please contact Dale to sell your Canadian securities and have them convert the proceeds to US Tell them to send the money to us for your account in Houston We still have not received your check Did you send it Let me know if you would like to grab a drink over the next weeks Everything is slowing down for the holidays and my shopping to done Stephen P Brown Financial Consultant RBC Dain Rauscher West Sam Houston Parkway South Suite Houston TX Phone Fax

RE Funds From CanadaPST When do you want to meet Give me a few options Stephen P Brown Financial Consultant RBC Dain Rauscher West Sam Houston Parkway South Suite Houston TX Phone Fax Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday February PM To Brown Stephen Subject RE Funds From Canada Hey Stephen Glad to hear the funds finally showed up It would be helpful to me if we could hook back up together in the next little while Id like to get your opinion on a few different thoughts that Ive had I need to do some financial planning so to speak Let me know how your schedule is looking Thanks Jon Original Message From Brown Stephen Stephen bcdaincomENRON Sent Tuesday February AM To Mckay Jonathan Subject Funds From Canada Your remaining funds from Canada have arrived into your account Give me a call when you can Stephen P Brown Financial Consultant RBC Dain Rauscher West Sam Houston Parkway South Suite Houston TX Phone Fax This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Cost BasisPST We are trying to establish your cost basis in your account Do you have confirms from the purchase date on your securities so we can see when the securities were purchased We need to know the date because of the currency conversion Dale Onrait in Canada said you purchased the securities from another branch so he does not have the records This is for your benefit in determining your position if you sell the securities Also please contact Dale to sell your Canadian securities and have them convert the proceeds to US Tell them to send the money to us for your account in Houston We still have not received your check Did you send it Let me know if you would like to grab a drink over the next weeks Everything is slowing down for the holidays and my shopping to done Stephen P Brown Financial Consultant RBC Dain Rauscher West Sam Houston Parkway South Suite Houston TX Phone Fax

Funds From CanadaPST Your remaining funds from Canada have arrived into your account Give me a call when you can Stephen P Brown Financial Consultant RBC Dain Rauscher West Sam Houston Parkway South Suite Houston TX Phone Fax

Canadian TransferPST The transfer of your securities and mutual funds is in process There are a few Canadian items that will not transfer You mentioned that you would like to sell the Canadian securities and transfer the cash Can you please call Dale Onrait at and have him liquidate the Canadian positions and tell him you would like the proceeds and the Candian cash to be converted to US dollars and transfered to RBC Dain Rauscher This instruction must come from you If you have any questions please give me a call Stephen P Brown Financial Consultant RBC Dain Rauscher West Sam Houston Parkway South Suite Houston TX Phone Fax
